status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

status.name: Closed

fields.description:
h3. Steps to Reproduce
When prompted to install 3.3.x update:
Select install. 
Install fails with error
Tried following directions given from this wiki page with no success
http://docs.appcelerator.com/titanium/3.0/#!/guide/Errors_While_Updating

h3. Actual Result
Error:
Error encountered during update
Operation details
Cannot complete the install because of a conflicting dependency.
Software being installed: Titanium Studio Root Files 3.3.0.201406271151-27062014115140 (com.appcelerator.titanium.rcp.product.root.feature.feature.group 3.3.0.201406271151-27062014115140)
Software currently installed: Titanium Studio 3.3.0.201405271641-27052014164146 (com.appcelerator.titanium.rcp.product 3.3.0.201405271641-27052014164146)
Only one of the following can be installed at once: 
com.appcelerator.titanium.rcp.product.root.feature_root 3.3.0.201406271151-27062014115140
com.appcelerator.titanium.rcp.product.root.feature_root 3.3.0.201405271641-27052014164146
Cannot satisfy dependency:
From: Titanium Studio 3.3.0.201405271641-27052014164146 (com.appcelerator.titanium.rcp.product 3.3.0.201405271641-27052014164146)
To: com.appcelerator.titanium.rcp.product.root.feature.feature.group [3.3.0.201405271641-27052014164146]
Cannot satisfy dependency:
From: Titanium Studio Root Files 3.3.0.201405271641-27052014164146 (com.appcelerator.titanium.rcp.product.root.feature.feature.group 3.3.0.201405271641-27052014164146)
To: com.appcelerator.titanium.rcp.product.root.feature_root [3.3.0.201405271641-27052014164146]
Cannot satisfy dependency:
From: Titanium Studio Root Files 3.3.0.201406271151-27062014115140 (com.appcelerator.titanium.rcp.product.root.feature.feature.group 3.3.0.201406271151-27062014115140)
To: com.appcelerator.titanium.rcp.product.root.feature_root [3.3.0.201406271151-27062014115140]

h3. Expected Result
Install updated version

comments.body: Refreshed log file with only most recent entries

Hello,
which sources do you have for update? I mean, are you mixing testing with release? 

Best Regards!

Mauro,
I can't remember why, but at some point I did update to 3.3 RC on this machine. It's the only instance of Studio that's giving me problems. My other machine, on which I didn't install the RC, is fine. Is there a way to rollback or some how resolve this conflict? It hasn't affected my use of Studio, but it is an annoyance.

Hello,

the only option will be removing the current Ti Studio and then reinstall the previous version.

Best Regards,
Mauro
